title: MapDescriptor
description: Describes the properties of a Fortune Street map

desc.description: The description of the map which shall be displayed in the map selection screen

initialCash.description: The starting cash for each player

targetAmount.description: The target net worth needed to win

baseSalary.description: The constant amount of cash each player gets for every promotion

salaryIncrement.description: The increasing amount of cash each player gets for every promotion

maxDiceRoll.description: The maximum roll a player can get on this map. Lower than 5 or higher than 9 is known to cause crashes

frbFile1.description: The filename of the main frb board file without the file extension

frbFile2.description: The filename to the second frb file used for dynamic maps with switches

frbFile3.description: The filename to the third frb file used for dynamic maps with switches

frbFile4.description: The filename to the fourth frb file used for dynamic maps with switches

switchRotationOriginPoints.description: The origin points under which the squares should rotate around during the switch square map change animation sequence. When this property is omitted the squares will move linearly to their destination.

looping.description: Controls whether the map shall loop around the edges

radius.description: The radius of the cylindrical shape of the map. The higher this value the further apart from each other squares will be.

horizontalPadding.description: The horizontal padding between squares on the map. Used to adjust the distances between squares so that they are more uniform in all directions.

verticalSquareCount.description: The amount of squares this map has spread along the vertical axis. E.g. if you have 3 squares stacked on top of each other, the value here would be 3.

tourMode.description: The tour configuration for single player mode

bankruptcyLimit.description: How many players need to get bankrupted till the game ends

initialCash.description: The radius of the cylindrical shape of the map. The higher this value the further apart from each other squares will be.

clearRank.description: The rank the player must be at the end of the game for attaining the gold medal.

promotion.description: The music played when a player gets promoted.

winner.description: The music played when a player wins the match.

ventureCards.description: The music played when a player is picking a venture card.

stock.description: The music played when a player is buying or selling stocks.

auction.description: The music played when an auction is taking place.

roundTheBlocks.description: The music played when the round the blocks mini game is being played.

memoryBlock.description: The music played when the round the memory block mini game is being played.

dartOfGold.description: The music played when the dart of gold mini game is being played.

selectYourSlime.description: The music played when the players are picking their racing slime.

racingSlimes.description: The music played when the slimes are racing.

background.description: The background of the map. You can provide your own background without the file extension or choose one of these: bg001 = Yoshi's Island, bg002 = Mario Circuit, bg003 = Peach's Castle, bg004 = Mario Stadium, bg005 = Delfino Plaza, bg006 = Super Mario Bros, bg007 = Bowser's Castle, bg008 = Starship Mario, bg009 = Good Egg Galaxy, bg101 = Trodain Castle, bg102 = Ghost Ship, bg103 = The Colossus, bg103_e = The Colossus Easy, bg104 = Mt. Magmageddon, bg105 = Slimenia, bg106 = Robbin' Hood Ruins, bg107 = Alefgard, bg108 = Alltrades Abbey, bg109 = The Observatory, bg901 = Practice Board.

mapIcon.description: The map icon which to display at the map select screen. You can provide your own map icon as a png file without the file extension or choose one of these: p_bg_101 = Trodain Castle, p_bg_109 = The Observatory, p_bg_102 = Ghost Ship, p_bg_105 = Slimenia, p_bg_104 = Mt. Magmageddon, p_bg_106 = Robbin' Hood Ruins, p_bg_004 = Mario Stadium, p_bg_008 = Starship Mario, p_bg_002 = Mario Circuit, p_bg_001 = Yoshi's Island, p_bg_005 = Delfino Plaza, p_bg_003 = Peach's Castle, p_bg_107 = Alefgard, p_bg_006 = Super Mario Bros, p_bg_007 = Bowser's Castle, p_bg_009 = Good Egg Galaxy, p_bg_103 = The Colossus, p_bg_108 = Alltrades Abbey, p_bg_901 = Practice Board.

ventureCards.description: The venture cards which are enabled for this map.
